nodes.text: Rees Alrix was a female Jedi who lived during the last years of the Galactic Republic. Alrix was the first Padawan of the Gran Jedi Master Maks Leem, and she later left her tutelage and became a Knight in the Jedi Order. When the Clone Wars broke out across the galaxy and plunged the Republic into a war, Alrix, like many Jedi, fought in the Grand Army of the Republic. In 19 BBY, she led her clone troopers in the Battle of Sullust.
Rees Alrix was first mentioned in Yoda: Dark Rendezvous, a novel written by Sean Stewart and published in 2004.
